name: stopify-compiler-cloud-function
description: A Google Cloud Function that runs Stopify

scripts.deploy: gcloud beta functions deploy stopify --memory=2048MB --timeout=300 --stage-bucket stopify-cloud-function --trigger-http
scripts.deploy-testing: gcloud beta functions deploy stopifyTesting --memory=2048MB --timeout=300 --stage-bucket stopify-cloud-function --trigger-http
